en: He changed his name and surname many times for the purpose of hiding his identity, and now doesn't even recognize his own relatives.
pinyin: Tā wèi le yǐn míng mái xìng, gǎi míng huàn xìng duō cì, xiàn zài lián zì jǐ de qīn qiě dōu bú rèn shì le.

en: In ancient times, women usually changed their names only when they were forced to hide their identities in order to protect themselves and their families.
pinyin: Zài gǔ dài, nǚ zǐ tōng cháng zhǐ yǒu zài bèi pò yǐn míng mái xìng cái huì gǎi míng, wèi le bǎo zhù zì jǐ yǔ jiā zú de ān quán.

en: After his hidden identity was exposed, he was forced to leave that region and start a new life in another place.
pinyin: Tā de yǐn míng mái xìng bèi jiē chuān hòu, tā bèi pò lí kāi le nà gè dì qū, dào bié de dì fāng kāi shǐ xīn de shēng huó.

en: I haven’t seen him for a long time. I really didn’t recognize him a while ago.
